thread.title: Islanders hand Sharks first loss of season
thread.title_full: Islanders hand Sharks first loss of season - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Associated Press
title: Islanders hand Sharks first loss of season
text:
Photo: Bruce Bennett, Getty Images San Jose’s Ben Smith crumples to the ice in front of Islanders goalie Jaroslav Halak after being hit in the head with a puck. San Jose’s Ben Smith crumples to the ice in front of Islanders...
NEW YORK — The Sharks lost for the first time this season as the Islanders delivered again with a big win in their new Brooklyn home.
